reg.acttitle: Hotel Room Tax Act; Provincial Sales Tax Act*
reg.title: Hotel Room Tax Regulation for the City of Langley
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 165/2012, June 25, 2012]

section.sectiontext: In this regulation, Act means the Hotel Room Tax Act.
August 31, 2005 is the prescribed date after which section 3 of the Act applies in respect of accommodation purchased in the City of Langley.
The tax payable under section 3 (1) of the Act is 2% of the purchase price of accommodation purchased in the City of Langley.

section.marginalnote: Prescribed purpose for expenditure of tax
section.sectiontext: The City of Langley may spend the amount paid to it out of the revenue collected from the tax for tourism marketing.
This regulation is repealed effective July 1, 2017.

footnote.footnotetext: See section 45 of the Provincial Sales Tax Transitional Provisions and Amendments Act, 2013, S.B.C. 2013, c. 1
